uni.bielefeld.cmg.sparkhit.serializer

Class kryoSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • uni.bielefeld.cmg.sparkhit.serializer.kryoSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShKryoSerializer, ShSerializer

    public class kryoSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ShKryoSerializer
    Returns an object for serializing objects using kryo serializer.
    See Also:
